    • Method Detail

      • search

        EstoreSearch.Result search(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resourceResolver,
                           boolean estoreProducts,
                           boolean featuredItems,
                           String searchText)
        Search products under JCR by given parameters and checks their availability in SOLR index. Return products found in JCR and available in SOLR index.
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - - ResourceResolver
        estoreProducts - - search parameter (product property with id 4906)
        featuredItems - - search parameter (product property with id 4868)
        searchText - - parameter for fulltext search
        Returns:
        products found in JCR and available in SOLR index

      • search

        EstoreSearch.Result search(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resourceResolver,
                           boolean estoreProducts,
                           boolean featuredItems,
                           String searchText,
                           String[] rootIds)
        Search products under JCR by given parameters and checks their availability in SOLR index. Return products found in JCR and available in SOLR index.
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - - ResourceResolver
        estoreProducts - - search parameter (product property with id 4906)
        featuredItems - - search parameter (product property with id 4868)
        rootIds - - paths for search
        searchText - - parameter for fulltext search
        Returns:
        products found in JCR and available in SOLR index
